tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First time I visited The Smile’s Centre Dental Clinic.  I am highly impressed the way of hospitality and treatment procedure explanation and experience what I had during RCT.  I strongly recommend to visit for any teeth concerns

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
During the initial consultation, she has explained what the issue is and also explained the entire treatment process.
- Scheduled all the follow up appointments at a convenient time and ensured that the treatment was completed with in time as mentioned initially
- Answered all the questions patiently
- Very much satisfied with treatment and would recommend for any kind of dental problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor for the first time for root canal treatment. I was so scared to take the treatment as I had a very bad experience with rct with other doctor. But Dr. Vikasini has done the treatment  very professionally without causing  any pain. I am very much satisfied with her treatment and I highly recommend her for any kind of dental treatment. She is very friendly and explains the problem very clearly before doing the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vikasini is a friendly professional dentist.  She answers all the questions patiently. Her approach to treatment is very methodical and well planned.  I am very happy with her treatment and I would recommend her to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr.Vikasini and team are friendly and sensitivity issue almost resolved satisfied with treatment..would definitely recommend this doctor for any kind of dental issues.
reply_text: Thank you Reshmi...and our team will always help you out with any of your dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor explains the problem well and will not hurry you for subsequent treatment. 
Checks thoroughly

review: Inetraction with me is very good and explained in detail about my problem and the solution. Happy to see the doctor.

review: Would definitely recommend the doctor for her professionalism, friendly nature, convenient appointment scheduling.

review: Very nice experience  travelling with you..very nice friendly treatment and timings for appointments also very neat and clear..for appointments also you called me when I was forgot and remembering  is the good thing for me..and doctor is very friendly with me..so I can recommend for those hospitals like this in manikonda is rare thing...
